column2: Force another §Ycountry§W to pay reparations to us
The Shah, after witnessing a military demostration by a european power, have decided to visit the continent. One wonders what effect this will have on him

The Báb, leader of the babist movement has for some time been in our possesion. Due to recent unrest among the followers of Babiism, powerfull figures in our court wish to execute him. This will hopefully restore unity to the empire, but might cause short term turmoil.
